title: Enter the Dragon (1973) Duel Sided Special Edition
description:
Enter the Dragon (1973) ***Duel Sided Special Edition



***This is one of those Old DvDs with the Film on One side and the Extras on the other hence the two Discs



Extras include: Special Introduction to the film from Bruce Lee's Wife + Audio Commentary with Paul Heller & Michael Allin + Music only Track (5.1) + Original Featurette + Interview with Linda Lee Cadwell + Backyard Workout with Bruce + 7 Tv Spots and 4 trailers 



Audio: English



Subtitles: English



**********************************************************************************

****-Note About DvD-**** 

Nothing has been added nor taken away it is as I received it. If there are no subs in your required language it is because there were none on the DvD and I was unable to procure a DvD with those Subs.

PAL


1751 x 4MB packets 


Initial Seeding Process Used



Enter the Dragon revolves around the three main characters. Lee, a man recruited by an agency to investigate a tournament hosted by Han, since they believe he has an Opium trade there. Roper and Williams are former army buddies since Vietnam and they enter the tournament due to different problems that they have. Roper is on the run from the Mafia due to his gambling debts, while Williams is harassed by racist police officers and defends himself from them and uses the car for his getaway. It is a deadly tournament that they will enter on an island. Lee's job is to get the other two out of there alive.
